languages.text: Every {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, after the character kills the first enemy, the character immediately makes an additional single attack against the closest enemy they can target with the same weapon if possible. This attack deals 30% base {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with a +10% bonus for every {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} of the first killed enemy, i.e. if the enemy was of difficulty tier I, this attack deals 40% damage in total.
languages.original_text: Каждый {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}, убив первого врага, персонаж немедленно совершает дополнительную одиночную атаку против ближайшего противника тем же оружием, если это возможно. Эта атака наносит 30% от базового {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} с бонусом +10% за каждый {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}ранг{/g} убитого перед этим врага. Например, устранив цель I ранга, дополнительной атакой персонаж нанесет 40% урона.

traits.locale_text: Every round, after the character kills first enemy, the character immediately makes an additional single attack against one closest enemy they can target with the same weapon, if possible. This attack deals 40% base damage with a +15% bonus for every difficulty tier of the first killed enemy, i.e. if the enemy was of difficulty tier I, this attack deals 55% damage in total.

Every round, after the character kills first enemy, the character immediately makes an additional single attack against the closest enemy they can target with the same weapon if possible. This attack deals 40% base damage with a +15% bonus for every difficulty tier of the first killed enemy, i.e. if the enemy was of difficulty tier I, this attack deals 55% damage in total.

Every {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, after the character kills the first enemy, the character immediately makes an additional single attack against the closest enemy they can target with the same weapon if possible. This attack deals 30% base {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with a +10% bonus for every {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} of the first killed enemy, i.e. if the enemy was of difficulty tier I, this attack deals 40% damage in total.

Every {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, after the character kills first enemy, the character immediately makes an additional single attack against the closest enemy they can target with the same weapon if possible. This attack deals 30% base damage with a +10% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} for every {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} of the first killed enemy, i.e. if the enemy was of difficulty tier I, this attack deals 55% damage in total.

Every {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, after the character kills the first enemy, the character immediately makes an additional single attack against the closest enemy they can target with the same weapon if possible. This attack deals 30% base {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with a +10% bonus for every {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} of the first killed enemy, i.e. if the enemy was of difficulty tier I, this attack deals 40% damage in total.

languages.text: Cada {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}, después de que el personaje mate al primer enemigo, el personaje lanza inmediatamente un ataque individual extra contra el enemigo más cercano al que pueda atacar con la misma arma (si lo hay). Este ataque inflige un 30 % del {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} base con un +10 % de bonificación por cada {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}nivel de desafío{/g} del primer enemigo abatido. Por ejemplo, si el enemigo era de nivel de desafío I, el ataque inflige un total del 40 % de daño.
languages.original_text: Every {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, after the character kills the first enemy, the character immediately makes an additional single attack against the closest enemy they can target with the same weapon if possible. This attack deals 30% base {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with a +10% bonus for every {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} of the first killed enemy, i.e. if the enemy was of difficulty tier I, this attack deals 40% damage in total.

traits.locale_text: Cada {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}, después de que el personaje mate al primer enemigo, el personaje lanza inmediatamente un ataque individual extra contra el enemigo más cercano al que pueda atacar con la misma arma (si lo hay). Este ataque inflige un 40 % del daño base con un +15 % de {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por cada {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}nivel de desafío{/g} del primer enemigo abatido. Por ejemplo, si el enemigo era de nivel de desafío I, el ataque inflige un total del 55 % de daño.

languages.text: 毎{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}、このキャラクターが最初の敵を倒した後、同じ武器でターゲット可能な最も近くの敵に対して、追加の単体攻撃を即座に行う。この攻撃の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}は、基本ダメージの30%に加えて、最初に倒した敵の{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}脅威度{/g}1につき+10%の{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を得る（例：敵が脅威度Iであった場合、この攻撃は計40%のダメージを与える）
languages.original_text: Every {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, after the character kills the first enemy, the character immediately makes an additional single attack against the closest enemy they can target with the same weapon if possible. This attack deals 30% base {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with a +10% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} for every {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} of the first killed enemy, i.e. if the enemy was of difficulty tier I, this attack deals 40% damage in total.

traits.locale_text: 毎{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}、このキャラクターが最初の敵を倒した後、同じ武器でターゲット可能な最も近くの敵に対して、追加の単体攻撃を即座に行う。この攻撃のダメージは、基本ダメージの40%に加えて、最初に倒した敵の{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}脅威度{/g}1につき+15%の{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を得る（例：敵が脅威度Iであった場合、この攻撃は計55%のダメージを与える）

languages.text: 每一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}中，当角色首次杀死敌人时，该角色会立即使用同样的武器，对距离最近的敌人发动一次额外的单体攻击。此次攻击造成30%的基础{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，首次杀死的敌人每有1级{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}难度等级{/g}，此次攻击获得10%的伤害{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}。例如，如果首个杀死的敌人难度等级为I，则此次攻击一共会造成40%的基础伤害。
languages.original_text: Every {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, after the character kills the first enemy, the character immediately makes an additional single attack against the closest enemy they can target with the same weapon if possible. This attack deals 30% base {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with a +10% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} for every {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} of the first killed enemy, i.e. if the enemy was of difficulty tier I, this attack deals 40% damage in total.

traits.locale_text: 每一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}中，当角色首次杀死敌人时，该角色会立即使用同样的武器，对距离最近的敌人发动一次额外的单体攻击。此次攻击造成40%的基础伤害，首次杀死的敌人每有1级{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}难度等级{/g}，此次攻击获得15%的伤害{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}。例如，如果首个杀死的敌人难度等级为I，则此次攻击一共会造成55%的基础伤害。

languages.text: In jeder {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} nachdem der Charakter den ersten Gegner getötet hat, führt er sofort einen zusätzlichen Einzelangriff gegen den nächstgelegenen Gegner aus, den er mit derselben Waffe anvisieren kann. Dieser Angriff verursacht 30 % {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Grundschaden{/g} mit +10 % {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} für jede {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}Schwierigkeitsstufe{/g} des ersten getöteten Gegners. Hatte der Gegner Schwierigkeitsstufe I, verursacht dieser Angriff also insgesamt 40 % Schaden.
languages.original_text: Every {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, after the character kills the first enemy, the character immediately makes an additional single attack against the closest enemy they can target with the same weapon if possible. This attack deals 30% base {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with a +10% bonus for every {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} of the first killed enemy, i.e. if the enemy was of difficulty tier I, this attack deals 40% damage in total.

traits.locale_text: In jeder {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} nachdem der Charakter den ersten Gegner getötet hat, führt er sofort einen zusätzlichen Einzelangriff gegen den nächstgelegenen Gegner aus, den er mit derselben Waffe falls möglich anvisieren kann. Dieser Angriff verursacht 40% Grundschaden mit +15% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} für jede {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}Schwierigkeitsstufe{/g} des ersten getöteten Gegners; wenn der Gegner also die Schwierigkeitsstufe I hatte, verursacht dieser Angriff insgesamt 55% Schaden.

languages.text: À chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, après avoir éliminé un premier ennemi, le personnage lance immédiatement une attaque ponctuelle supplémentaire contre l'ennemi le plus proche qu'il peut cibler, si possible avec la même arme. Cette attaque inflige 30 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} de base avec un bonus de +10 % par {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}niveau de difficulté{/g} du premier ennemi tué ; autrement dit, pour un ennemi de niveau de difficulté I, cette attaque inflige au total 40 % de dégâts.
languages.original_text: Every {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, after the character kills the first enemy, the character immediately makes an additional single attack against the closest enemy they can target with the same weapon if possible. This attack deals 30% base {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with a +10% bonus for every {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} of the first killed enemy, i.e. if the enemy was of difficulty tier I, this attack deals 40% damage in total.

traits.locale_text: À chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, après avoir éliminé un premier ennemi, le personnage lance immédiatement une attaque ponctuelle supplémentaire contre l'ennemi le plus proche qu'il peut cibler, si possible avec la même arme. Cette attaque inflige 40 % de dégâts de base avec un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de +15 % par {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}niveau de difficulté{/g} du premier ennemi tué ; autrement dit, pour un ennemi de niveau de difficulté I, cette attaque inflige au total 55 % de dégâts.

languages.text: Каждый {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}, убив первого врага, персонаж немедленно совершает дополнительную одиночную атаку против ближайшего противника тем же оружием, если это возможно. Эта атака наносит 30% от базового {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} с бонусом +10% за каждый {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}ранг{/g} убитого перед этим врага. Например, устранив цель I ранга, дополнительной атакой персонаж нанесет 40% урона.
languages.original_text: Every {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, after the character kills the first enemy, the character immediately makes an additional single attack against the closest enemy they can target with the same weapon if possible. This attack deals 30% base {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with a +10% bonus for every {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} of the first killed enemy, i.e. if the enemy was of difficulty tier I, this attack deals 40% damage in total.

traits.locale_text: Каждый {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}, убив первого врага, персонаж немедленно совершает дополнительную одиночную атаку против ближайшего противника тем же оружием, если это возможно. Эта атака наносит 40% от базового урона с {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусом{/g} +15% за каждый {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}уровень сложности{/g} убитого перед этим врага. Например, устранив цель со сложностью I, дополнительной атакой персонаж нанесет 55% урона.

Каждый {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}, убив первого врага, персонаж немедленно совершает дополнительную одиночную атаку против ближайшего противника тем же оружием, если это возможно. Эта атака наносит 40% от базового урона с {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусом{/g} +15% за каждый {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}уровень сложности{/g} убитого перед этим врага. Например, устранив цель со сложностью I, дополнительной атакой персонаж нанесет 55% урона.
